name: Gurdas Maan
description: '''Gurdas Maan''' (born 4 January 1957) is an Indian singer, songwriter and actor mainly associated with [[Punjabi language|Punjabi]] language [[Music of Punjab|music]] and [[Punjabi cinema|films]]. He gained national attention in 1980 with the song "Dil Da Mamla Hai". Since then, he had gone on to record over 34 albums and had written over 305 songs. In 2015 he performed on the song "Ki Banu Dunia Da" with [[Diljit Dosanjh]] in [[Coke Studio (India)|MTV Coke studio India]] that was aired in season 4 episode 5 (16 August 2015) on [[MTV India]]. He is widely regarded as one of the greatest and the most influential Punjabi musicians of all time.
